history.proof: intros d a la ls hd tl l H. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

ctx: intros d a la ls hd tl l H.
tactic: apply liste_reconnait_ind with (p := d) (p0 := ls) (t := tcons hd tl).
exceptions.exn: Abstracting over the terms "d", "ls" and "tcons hd tl" leads to a term fun (d0 : preDTA) (ls0 : prec_list) (t : term_list) => u_conv_lr_0 d0 (prec_cons a la ls0) t (rec_consn d0 a la ls0 hd tl l) which is ill-typed. Reason is: Illegal application: The term "rec_consn" of type "forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)" cannot be applied to the terms "d0" : "preDTA" "a" : "ad" "la" : "prec_list" "ls0" : "prec_list" "hd" : "term" "tl" : "term_list" "l" : "liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl)" The 7th term has type "liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl)" which should be coercible to "liste_reconnait d0 ls0 (tcons hd tl)".

original: intros d a la ls hd tl l H. apply liste_reconnait_ind with (p := d) (p0 := ls) (t := tcons hd tl). - intros. contradiction (sem_listes_1 d hd tl H0). - intros. apply u_conv0_3 with (r := rec_dta d a hd x x0) (l0 := l). + apply H0. + apply H1. - auto.
